item.title: EP 132 - Digital TV: The Alien Conspiracy
item.itunes:title: Digital TV: The Alien Conspiracy
item.description:
Today we look at killer sandwiches, hallucinations of tiny people, and then we take a look at the conspiracy theory of why we really switched over to digital television.

Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!
https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

A man recently took a close look at his sandwich and noticed an unknown powder. Little did he know he had possibly just caught a serial killer.

Then we take a look at Visual Release Hallucinations, a bizarre condition that causes nearly blind people to see tiny people and even cartoon characters interacting with the world around them.

And finally, we look at a conspiracy that I came up with: What is the real reason behind switching over from analogue to digital TV? Was it so consumers would have a better viewing experience? Or was it something more sinister than that?

Links:

German man suspected of killing 21 colleagues in poisoned sandwich plot, police say

https://www.independent.co.uk/news/world/europe/german-poisoning-deaths-schloss-holtestukenbrock-police-colleagues-heavy-metal-poison-serial-killer-a8423136.html

Visual Release Hallucinations (Charles Bonnet syndrome)

https://medcomic.com/medcomic/visual-release-hallucinations-charles-bonnet-syndrome/

Visual release hallucinations

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Visual_release_hallucinations

Visual release hallucinations (Charles Bonnet syndrome)

https://www.uptodate.com/contents/visual-release-hallucinations-charles-bonnet-syndrome

Methanol toxicity

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Methanol_toxicity

Analog Versus Digital TV: What's the Difference?

http://www.informit.com/articles/article.aspx?p=1245329

Can our TV signals be picked up on other planets?

http://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/uk_news/magazine/7544915.stm

Next On TV

http://nextonet.tv/

E.T. PHONE HOME

https://briankoberlein.com/2015/02/19/e-t-phone-home/

Are Aliens Watching Old TV Shows?

https://www.universetoday.com/118250/are-aliens-watching-old-tv-shows/

DTV Is Coming (And Sooner Than You Think!)

http://westwindsornj.org/fcc_dtv.pdf

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black
"As Above" Art By Grant Scott
Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"
Closing Song: "Bella Royale"
Music By Dr. Huxxxtable
Hood River

 

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @JasonOCarpenter

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/deadrabbitradio/

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018
